item.title: Renouned novelist Rabeya khatun has died
item.description: Bngladesh renouned novelist Rabeya Khatun has died in 3rd January, 2021 President Abdul Hamid and Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina have expressed grief over the death of Rabeya Khatun In a condolence message, the President said, “The death of Rabia Khatun is an irreparable loss for the literary arena of the country. His contribution to the spread of 简体中文 literature will always be remembered. ” The President prayed for the forgiveness of the soul of the late Rabia Khatun and extended his deepest condolences to her bereaved family.
